channel.title: [Pi] 317 How to add shops ! [Noob Friendly]
channel.description:
This came from my server released thread, someone asked how so i thought i post it on here too !
Edit : Inspired to make this thread by "DingDongDIng" !
you can find it here ! http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,549704.0.html
First off All server sided : Server>Source>Data>cfg>shops i remember shops 16-17 above is points shop (Ex : pvp point, pest control) so if you are planning to make a new shop add a new line Ex :[code]shop = 14 Fishing_Shop 2 2 303 10 311 10 301 10 317 100 335 100 359 100 7944 100 386 10000 389 100 331 100[/code]
14 = shop Number
1 = only buy 2 = sell/buy
Item Id Amount Of item Item Id Amount 303 10 311 10 and so on.
after you done that save.
Next : Open Actionhandler.java search for shop
should look like this [code]case 2244: c.getShops().openShop(30); break;[/code]
Case 2244 = Npc Id c.getShops().openshop(30); = telling the action when click on Npc it will open shop #30
If you search Firstclicknpc = 1 click on npc, instead of right click on npc and select trade.
Secondclicknpc = right click on npc required to select whatever option.
EDIT : DONT USE WANNESHOP

item.title: [Pi] 317 How to add shops ! [Noob Friendly]
item.dc:creator: @yesimanub yesimanub
item.description:
@yesimanub wrote:

This came from my server released thread, someone asked how so i thought i post it on here too !

Edit : Inspired to make this thread by “DingDongDIng” !

you can find it here !

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

First off
All server sided :
Server>Source>Data>cfg>shops
i remember shops 16-17 above is points shop (Ex : pvp point, pest control)
so if you are planning to make a new shop add a new line
Ex :shop = 14 Fishing_Shop 2 2 303 10 311 10 301 10 317 100 335 100 359 100 7944 100 386 10000 389 100 331 100

14 = shop Number

1 = only buy
2 = sell/buy

Item Id Amount Of item Item Id Amount
303 10 311 10
and so on.

after you done that save.

Next : Open Actionhandler.java
search for shop

should look like this case 2244: c.getShops().openShop(30); break;

Case 2244 = Npc Id
c.getShops().openshop(30); = telling the action when click on Npc it will open shop #30

If you search
Firstclicknpc = 1 click on npc, instead of right click on npc and select trade.

Secondclicknpc = right click on npc required to select whatever option.

EDIT : DONT USE WANNESHOP

Read full topic
